official-title.#text: To discontinue eligibility of former Members of Congress and their dependents for coverage under the Federal Employees Health Benefit Program (FEHBP) if the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act is repealed.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on
, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

short-title.#text: No Health Care for Life for Congress Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Discontinuing eligibility of former Members of Congress and their dependents for coverage under FEHBP if PPACA is repealed

text.#text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, if the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is repealed, as of the first day of the first month beginning 30 days after the date of enactment of such repeal, any individual who is a former Member of Congress shall not be eligible to enroll or continue coverage for the former Member or the former Member’s dependents in a health benefits plan under the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: only applies to coverage derived by virtue of service as a former Member of Congress and does not apply to coverage under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: No Health Care for Life for Congress Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

text.#text: who was a member of the Senate or House of Representatives, a Delegate to the House of Representatives, or the Resident Commissioner from Puerto Rico; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: immediately after retirement as such a member, Delegate, or Resident Commissioner.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2894 IH: No Health Care for Life for Congress Act of 2013
